channel.title: Req lock
channel.description:
Ok DemisePking stopped his service so I decided I will take it on :P
Please note I don't have as much free time as him, and I will actually spend longer than 5 minutes on each project, so it will take me probably a day to finish each that I accept. Therefor I will only accept projects that give me as much information as possible. Here are some things that I need: Edit: If you only want a pre-made background with just text added, go [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,433245.0.html]HERE[/url]: If you you want a custom background: [b]Name of Server (as you want it to appear):[/b] __________ [b]One line of text (optional):[/b] __________ [b]Owner name (optional):[/b] __________ [b]Uploaded pictures I want included (optional):[/b] [b]Type of pictures you wanted added:[/b] (anything, like 'gwd bosses' or 'pretty ladies') [b]Main BG Color:[/b] __________ [b]Secondary color (optional):[/b] __________ Give as much information as possible, even if it is not one of the above.

item.title: Req lock
item.dc:creator: @DemisePking DemisePking
item.description:
@DemisePking wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:88, topic:336553”][quote author=DemisePking link=topic=432923.msg3180862#msg3180862 date=1271287295]

How about you both stop flaming each other and keep yourselves to your own threads, instead of filling both of these threads with pointless spam and flame?

I havent flamed him, im just waiting for him to stop blagging and admit that he cant do shit in macromedia flash. Ive already considered his arguement and realised its just utter garbage spawned from an attempt to save the fact he made a useless post on my first thread.
[/quote]Your ignorance is so amazing I don’t feel the need to prove myself to you anymore. Added you to my ignore list, so I won’t need to listen to this anymore. I suggest you do the same.

[quote author=Primadude link=topic=432923.msg3180864#msg3180864 date=1271287392]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=432923.msg3180856#msg3180856 date=1271287130]

How about you both stop flaming each other and keep yourselves to your own threads, instead of filling both of these threads with pointless spam and flame?
[/quote]What’s the point of having two threads anyway…

You’re both trying to complete with each other, therefore you created this topic and Demise created a new topic to try and out-do this one. There really isn’t any point.

[/quote]I created this topic after Demise closed his, because I thought that the people would still want to have someone willing to make them things.

Now I realize people don’t care for originality anymore, and it’s all about ‘cool things’, no matter what it is. Therefore, I close this thread with the knowledge that the world has changed.

DemisePking feel free to gloat and say you won, because while people may love your text-adding-image-leeching capabilities, I will always know the true measure of your graphic design skills.

Req lock.[/quote]

  1. Thanks for proving you cant do shit on macromedia flash
  2. Thanks for proving your arguement has ultimately failed, as it was destined to from the start
  3. I knew that you’d do this from the start.
  4. I didnt realise there was an ignore option on this website, thank god.
  5. People care for good originality, not a load of alpha’d google images with some text on it
